title: Hashinshin is going to love the Aatrox rework
body: It's well known exactly how much he adores Riven, and since we know that, we know that he's going to absolutely love the new Aatrox, and will praise Rito to the heavens for it.

replies.body: NERF SINGED NERF SINGED SNERF SNINGED
THROW ANOTHER ROCK THROW ANOTHER ROCK

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=75qyyEre,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-12T20:08:09.566+0000)
>
> NERF SINGED NERF SINGED SNERF SNINGED

Serf Ninged?
I love jax, but id be so happy to see jax gutted just to watch his reaction.

Aatrox went from 1 knock up, 1 dash and 1 slow.

to

3 knock ups, 1 displacement, 1 slow and 2 dashes.

Also he has an anti shield mechanic for some reason and his healing is basically a Raast passive.

Don't get me wrong he looks badass as fuck and it looks fun to play but jesus, I understand why someone could get mad because of that.

When you adore a champ no matter how they change them itll ruin them for you, he was the best designed champion to many and although he was bad at times and god awful to play against at other times he was still someones OTP or true champion
